entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 5. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High 8.
